title: Insightful EDA + modeling LGBM hyperopt
description: Welcome to my EDA KernelDescription:The dataset for this competition includes aggregate stopped vehicle information and intersection wait times. Your task is to predict congestion, based on an aggregate measure of stopping distance and waiting times, at intersections in 4 major US cities: Atlanta, Boston, Chicago & Philadelphia.
